titleStmt.title: The rape, or, The innocent impostors a tragedy acted at the Theatre-Royal by Their Majesties servants.
titleStmt.author: Brady, Nicholas, 1659-1726.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Nicholas Brady. Cf. Nicoll, A. Hist. of Engl. drama, 1660-1900, 1961, v. 1, p. 394.
